overview: Bareback 7 (Aggressive Bottoms From Hell) is two hours and 5 minutes of nonstop, verbal, fast paced, intense, raw man fucking. The bottoms and tops are equally pissed off, which makes for some of the most highly energy charged fucking ever.  "THE ULTIMATE TWIST!" Aggressive muscle bottoms overpower, restrain and arbitrarily use big muscle tops as human fuck poles in the ultimate twist.
title: Bareback 7: Aggressive Bottoms from Hell
